General.Name: Globaltruck Management PAO
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company Globaltruck Management engages in the provision of cargo transportation services in Russia and internationally. The company also provides freight forwarding services. It serves retail, bulk, e-commerce, and parcel industry sectors. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Moscow, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Globaltruck Management is a subsidiary of GT Globaltruck Limited.
